ISSUE.TITLE: Upgrade JustTrustMe
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I can see JustTrustMe Apk is 5 months old, no versioning again makes it hard to pinpoint. Project has had many updates https://github.com/Fuzion24/JustTrustMe might make sense to upgrade your apk set.

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Adding support for tenant specific static files (#37) * Metadata filename bug fix * Using user_app_ consistently * Field naming in tests * Adding ADMIN_GROUP support * Adding logging * Rolling back changes * Reverting utils.py * Fixing app name/version bug * Remove all cookies * Add support for re-uploading with updated fields * Removed validate_extradata * Flake8 fixes * Added support to skip scanning on upload * Removing scan_complete function * Removing scan_complete * Flake8 fixes * Mutiple country select * UI updates * Hiding rescan button Co-authored-by: Brice Williams <brice@cyberspect.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Bug #97 (#38) * Metadata filename bug fix * Using user_app_ consistently * Field naming in tests * Adding ADMIN_GROUP support * Adding logging * Rolling back changes * Reverting utils.py * Fixing app name/version bug * Remove all cookies * Add support for re-uploading with updated fields * Removed validate_extradata * Flake8 fixes * Added support to skip scanning on upload * Removing scan_complete function * Removing scan_complete * Flake8 fixes * Mutiple country select * UI updates * Hiding rescan button * Updating report logos * Improved error handling for existing scan Co-authored-by: Brice Williams <brice@cyberspect.com>
